text:
Delivery was slightly earlier than requested and food was still warm when it came. Portion given was good and more than enough for 10 pax. The CNY mini buffet set has 8 dishes, 1 dessert, packet drinks and cutlery was also provided. Favourite dishes are golden salted egg prawn and prawn paste chicken. It's our first time ordering from foodline and this vendor for CNY, overall it's a thumbs up for the whole ordering till delivery process.

{Ordered from FoodLine.sg for 27 Jan 2025} foodline

Many of our guests loved the food. We ordered from Robert Catering many times. The display and especially the taste never failed us. All the dishes are good. Well done, Robert Catering! :)

{Ordered from FoodLine.sg for 17 Apr 2025} foodline

Delivery was prompt. Fast set up. Food is ok, though my hubby says a little bland. Our guests enjoyed. Thank you very much.

{Ordered from FoodLine.sg for 24 Dec 2024} foodline

I love Robert Catering food. The portions are quite big too. Food is good too. Will get from Robert Catering with future birthday orders. Thank you.

{Ordered from FoodLine.sg for 09 Mar 2025} foodline

The food and services from +Robert Catering are good. The staffs are friendly and quite professional. They came on time and our guests enjoyed the food. The only comment is the quantity of the food. We ordered 30pax for 28 adults, but it seemed not enough.

{Ordered from FoodLine.sg for 25 Dec 2024}
